meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Holly Stewart Rebecca Wald Grant McSheffrey Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7490.

td.p: Holly Stewart, a tax attorney from Atlanta, Georgia
Rebecca Wald, a psychologist from Baltimore, Maryland
Grant McSheffrey, a software developer from Ottawa, Ontario, Canada (whose 3-day cash winnings total $69,201)

tr.td: YOUR IDIOM IS FOREIGN TO ME
WOMEN IN HISTORY
COLLEGE COLLAGE
"I" TUNES
ALSO A ROMAN DEITY
'TIS IRISH LITERATURE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'A German idiom for "a pig in a poke" is "buying" this animal "in a sack"; time to let it "out of the bag"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: A German idiom for "a pig in a poke" is "buying" this animal "in a sack"; time to let it "out of the bag"

$9,601
RebeccaWhat is The Princess Bride?
$11,000
The Princess Bride')
